saltmarsh 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Return multi-class AUC (Area Under the Curve) for ranger models from caret

Source: R/aucs.R
aucs.Rd

To use this, you must do the following when training the model:

  • Class names must be valid R variables, so not 1, 2, 3, ... They must still be factors.

  • You'll need to supply the trControl option to train with the following: control <- trainControl(
    allowParallel = TRUE,
    method = 'cv',
    number = 5,
    classProbs = TRUE,
    savePredictions = 'final'
    )

If class levels all end in numbers (e.g., class1, class, class3), the result will be sorted by the numbers so you won't get crap like class1, class10, class100.

Usage

aucs(fit, sort = TRUE)

Arguments

fit

Model fit from train

sort

If TRUE, sort classes by trailing number

Value

A vector with the AUC for each class
